data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hendrixson, Brent E., Bond, Jason E. (2004): A new species of Stasimopus from the Eastern Cape Province of South Africa (Araneae, Mygalomorphae, Ctenizidae), with notes on its natural history.
